detail.description: GMM Pfaudler manufactures corrosion resistant glass-lined equipments [1]. It is a leading supplier of process equipments to the pharmaceutical and chemical industries [2]. Over the years GMMP has diversified its product portfolio to include Mixing Systems, Filtration & Drying Equipment, Engineered Systems and Heavy Engineering Equipments.
